Title: Optimize endpoint management with automation at scale | ODFP999
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Watch COO Colin Britton in this 13-minute session, featuring a 4-minute overview and a product demo. Learn how Devicie simplifies device management by automating Intune implementation, third-party application management, and compliance reporting. See how Devicie acts as your Tier 4 endpoint expert, maintaining an optimal state through automation while eliminating manual workloads. Streamline productivity, security, and visibility—empowering your teams to focus on strategic initiatives.

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿𝘀: \* Colin Britton 𝗦𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2024 event. View even more sessions on-demand and learn about Microsoft Ignite at https://ignite.microsoft.com

ODFP999 #MSIgnite
